data.title: KRTY Song & Wine Series — Visit Morgan Hill
data.meta_description: CLOS LACHANCE WINERY KRTY Song & Wine Series
data.text:
KRTY and Clos LaChance are excited to announce the 2023 Song & Wine Series. Listen to your favorite Country songs performed by the Songwriter's themselves held at the beautiful Clos LaChance Winery.

Details: Location: Clos LaChance Winery

Event: KRTY Song & Wine Series ​Season Pass

Tickets: Thursdays or Fridays, $300 each Single Show Tickets: $50/each ​

Time: Doors open at 6pm. Seating: All seating will be first come-first serve. Seating is limited so we encourage guests to bring their own lawn chairs or blanket.

Restrictions: Age 21 and over only. No outside alcohol allowed including previously purchased Clos LaChance Wines. Food available for purchase at the event. Outside food/picnic is also allowed, including sealed water bottles. No refunds on Live Music purchases.

UPCOMING DATES:

Sept 14 & 15: Jon Nite, Charles Esten, James Otto, Wynn Varble

Oct 5: Travis Denning, Cole Taylor, Bobby Pinson, Brett James

Oct 6: Cole Taylor, Bobby Pinson, Brett James, TBD

For additional information, please visit our FAQ page for details. Still have questions? Call our office at 408-686-1050.
